snippet.title: New Years 7016 - A Connor Sherlock "Walking Simulator"
snippet.description:
Let's see if a virtual club makes me as socially anxious as a real one. At least here you can cast yourself towards a fiery death into the heart of a dying star to escape.

I've fallen quite behind on Connor Sherlock's Walking-Sims A Month projects, as you can tell. This one was released in time for New Year's Day 2016 and is a bit of a brief intermission from the loose storyline the previous games were carrying throughout.

Yet another of Connor Sherlock's monthly releases, following The Last Visit to the Shard, Grave Apologies, and Syzygy. They're weirdly engrossing, atmospheric, and are pretty terrible for YouTube audiences, so I'm really looking forward to them!

You can get this and future works of Connor Sherlock at his Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/connorsherlock

Find me on the Internet:
Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/kurtjmac

Twitch: http://twitch.tv/kurtjmac

Thanks for watching! Like, favorite, subscribe, whatnot, indeed, and etcetera!
